= 7-segment LED Display Modules =

The purpose of this article is to demonstrate the use of an very simple LED display module, for example:
http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/02/7_segment_display_labeled.svg/220px-7_segment_display_labeled.svg.png

[...http://playground.arduino.cc/Main/SevenSegmentLibrary...]

= Hardware Required =

XMC1100 Boot Kit board and 7-segment Display: http://arduino-to-xmc.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/XMC1100_TM1640.jpg

= Circuit =

Connect the TM1640 display as:
 * Vcc to XMC +5V
 * GND to XMC GND
 * DIN to Arduino XMC Pin7
 * SCLK to Arduino XMC Pin 8
